means: [人名] [康沃尔人姓氏] 库奇绰号，红发人，来源于威尔士语，含义是“红”(red)
[人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 库奇职业名称，制作床者，来源于中世纪英语、古法语，含义是“床”(bed)

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个名词均可表示"沙发"之意。
means: couch ： 指供昼夜坐卧，似床一样的长沙发或睡椅。
sofa ： 指有扶手和靠背，可供多人坐或一个人睡的长沙发，也泛指沙发。

sentence.Network_en: Roy swung his legs carefully off the couch and sat up.
sentence.Network_cn: 罗伊小心地把腿挪下沙发，坐了起来。

sentence.Network_en: We were sitting on the couch in the living room watching TV.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们就坐在客厅的沙发上看电视。

sentence.Network_en: She slipped out of the jacket and tossed it on the couch.
sentence.Network_cn: 她麻利地脱下夹克，扔在了沙发上。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 《视与听》：70位导演的TOP10 ... 3、游戏规则 The Rules of the Game 5、沙发 Couch 7、军中禁恋 Beau Travail.

list.abs: 近来沙发冲浪(couch surfing)在台湾越来越受欢迎,许多青少年在有限的预算下,抢著出国当沙发客,《我‧睡了‧81个人的沙发》的作者连 …
花木语言_百度知道 ... 芦苇： reed 茅草： couch grass 凤尾草： fern.
摘要：　所谓“沙发土豆”(couch potato)是指长时间呆在沙发上看电视的一类人，他们整天什么事情都不干，拿着摇控器，蜷在沙发上…
马铃薯_互动百科 ... mashed potato 土豆泥 couch potato 电视迷（象个坐在沙发上的土豆一样） 门： 被子植物门( Magnoliophyta).
日常用品英文单词全集下 ... strong box;safe 保险箱 studio couch 单人沙发床 suitcase;trunk 衣箱；小型旅行箱.

jx.jx_cn_mean: 在接受精神分析（或精神病治疗）

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (as a noun denoting something to sleep on; as a verb in the sense 'lay something down'): from Old French couche (noun), coucher (verb), from Latin collocare 'place together' (see collocate)

entry.def: A couch is a long, comfortable seat for two or three people.

entry.tran: (病人接受检查或治疗时的)诊察台
entry.def: A couch is a narrow bed which patients lie on while they are being examined or treated by a doctor.
If a statement is couched in a particular style of language, it is expressed in that style of language.

example.ex: The new centre-right government's radical objectives are often couched in moderate terms...
example.tran: 新的中右翼政府经常以温和的语言表述其激进的目标。

example.ex: This time the proposal was couched as an ultimatum.
example.tran: 这一次该提议是以最后通牒的形式提出来的。

means.word_mean: 1. an upholstered seat for more than one person
2. a flat coat of paint or varnish used by artists as a primer
3. a narrow bed on which a patient lies during psychiatric or psychoanalytic treatment
1. formulate in a particular style or language;

sentences.sentence: "She cast her request in very polite language"

auth_sentence.content: Our boys almost fall off the couch in hysterics.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our boys almost fall off the couch in hysterics.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our boys almost fall off the couch in hysterics.

auth_sentence.content: Suddenly, I was wide awake on the couch.
auth_sentence.res_content: Suddenly, I was wide awake on the couch.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Suddenly, I was wide awake on the couch.

auth_sentence.content: But the real bird killer is on your couch.
auth_sentence.res_content: But the real bird killer is on your couch.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But the real bird killer is on your couch.

abbreviation.mean_cn: (尤指动物)俯伏的，蹲着的，抬头伏卧状的

sentences.en: Lie down on the couch if you're feeling ill.
sentences.cn: 如果你感觉不舒服就躺到沙发上去。

sentences.en: The patient lay on the couch, bare to the waist.
sentences.cn: 这位患者赤裸上身, 躺在诊察台上。

sentences.en: He couched his request in very polite terms.
sentences.cn: 他以非常礼貌的言词表达了自己的要求。

jushi.english: Lie down on the couch if you're feeling ill.
jushi.chinese: 如果你感觉不舒服就躺到沙发上去。

jushi.english: The patient lay on the couch, bare to the waist.
jushi.chinese: 这位患者赤裸上身,躺在诊察台上。

jushi.english: The government's refusal was couched in friendly language.
jushi.chinese: 政府用和善的语言拒绝了。
